articles.author: Keith Collantine
articles.title: Why Hulkenberg deal could lead to Renault reunion at Audi in 2026 - RaceFans
articles.description: Audi has named Nico Hulkenberg as one of its two drivers for 2026. Will his former Renault team mate Carlos Sainz Jnr join him?
articles.content:
Two years ago, when Audi announced its plans to enter Formula 1 in 2026, Nico Hulkenberg might not have occured to many as one of its potential drivers.
His career as a full-time F1 driver ended thr… [+4407 chars]
